GLACIUS [ entatha36chamber@hotmail.com]
Representin "CAPAAL"

 open up tha 13th chapta from a book of vicious rhymin' raptors, who capture fake mc's, who can't see the book CAPAAL, we stand tall, and look in our crystal ball, and see competitors fall, cuz they couldn't handle this fillipino rhymin' abomination, with a victorious proclamation, to blow up upon tha nation, who ain' ready for this, i'll withstand any weak ass dis, from anybody who trys to speculize or hypothasize, ayo i don't miss, im launching lyrics from lyrical rocket laucher, ayo i don't sponsor little envious punks whose rhymes stink like skunk, and wanna be like this fillipino munk who spittin' grade A raps that bust competitors of tha map and into tha next millenium.......hot shit is what im givin' em, everytime i step in a cypha, i'll spit acid saliva in tha face of all those who come in tha place, talkin' like they bad boys nigga you ain't mase, or puffy or tha L.O.X., i'll crush your wig harda than a ton of hallow blocks, when i come undetected like a fox, lurkin' low in tha tall grass, i'll leave fakes in tha past and leave'em in tha dust, bustin' hot shit is a must and a plus when i step into verbal combat, i never ever slack or lack tha skills to reacte to any so called m.c., when they know that my shit is on tha d-e-m-a-n-d

 I'D LIKE TO SHOUT OUT TO ALL MY 13TH CHAPTER PEEPS........RED, LORD RICO, ETC....(REPASENTIN' C-TOWN), EXCALLIBER, DIRTY, LIL MIKE, TERREL, KHAN, AND TO ALL MY NYC NIGGAS......AYO, BIG-UPS TO QUEENS ESPECIALLY
